title: S
clause_text: S.R.A. may proceed further to acquire the land wherein the amount of compensation shall be determined as per the provisions contained in the Chapter-V of the Slum Act.

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: S.R.A. may proceed further to acquire the land wherein the amount of compensation shall be determined as per the provisions contained in the Chapter-V of the Slum Act.
